file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 49-74-01-04 - HOURMETER/CYCLE COUNTER - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL HOURMETER/CYCLE COUNTER - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH APU T-62T-40C11 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove/install the hourmeter and cycle counter. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY AIRCRAFT WITH APU HOURMETER AND CYCLE COUNTER - 49-74-01-000-801-A T-62T-40C11 REMOVAL AIRCRAFT WITH APU HOURMETER AND CYCLE COUNTER - 49-74-01-400-801-A T-62T-40C11 INSTALLATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 49-74-01 Page 1 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 49-74-01-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH APU T-62T-40C11 2. HOURMETER AND CYCLE COUNTER - REMOVAL A. General (1) To do this task, refer to the instructions given in the latest revision of Hamilton Sundstrand bulletin 40C11-1 engine manual P/N 4501966. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 49-00-00/200 - MAINTENANCE PRACTICES AMM TASK 49-11-00-000-801-A/400 APU COWLING - REMOVAL C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 313 313 APU Cowling D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Work stand To get access to the APU work area 01 available F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 01 Does the task APU work area I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A WARNING: BEFORE YOU DO THE TASK OBEY THE SAFETY PRECAUTIONS GIVEN IN AMM MPP 49-00-00/200 TO PREVENT INJURY TO THE PERSONS AND DAMAGE TO THE MATERIAL. (1) On the circuit breaker panel, open these circuit breakers and attach DO-NOT-CLOSE tags to them: – APU FUEL SOV. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 49-74-01 Page 2 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (2) On the left power control and distribution box, open the APU GEN START circuit breaker and attach DO-NOT-CLOSE tag to it. (3) Remove the APU cowling ( AMM TASK 49-11-00-000-801-A/400). J. Removal SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) Remove the APU hourmeter and cycle counter. Refer to the latest revision of Hamilton Sundstrand bulletin 40C11-1 engine manual P/N 4501966. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 49-74-01 Page 3 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 49-74-01-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH APU T-62T-40C11 3. HOURMETER AND CYCLE COUNTER - INSTALLATION A. General (1) To do this task, refer to the instructions given in the latest revision of Hamilton Sundstrand bulletin 40C11-1 engine manual P/N 4501966. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 49-11-00-400-801-A/400 APU COWLING - INSTALLATION C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 313 313 APU Cowling D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Work stand To get access to the APU work area 01 available F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 01 Does the task APU work area I. Installation SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) Install the APU hourmeter and cycle counter. Refer to the latest revision of Hamilton Sundstrand bulletin 40C11-1 engine manual P/N 4501966. J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Remove the DO-NOT-CLOSE tags and close these circuit breakers. – APU FUEL SOV. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 49-74-01 Page 4 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (2) On the left power control and distribution box, remove the DO-NOT-CLOSE tag and close the APU GEN START circuit breaker. (3) Install the APU cowling ( AMM TASK 49-11-00-400-801-A/400). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 49-74-01 Page 5 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
